statements.impact_statement: Log4Shell RCE vulnerability affects all Spring Boot microservices. Critical risk due to internet-facing services and PII/PCI data processing. KEV-listed with known ransomware campaigns.
statements.action_statement: EMERGENCY: Upgrade to log4j-core@2.17.1 immediately. Deploy hotfix to all services within 4 hours. Implement WAF rules as temporary mitigation.

statements.impact_statement: Kafka authentication bypass allows unauthorized access to message broker. Order events and user data flow through Kafka. High risk of data breach.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to kafka-clients@3.6.1. Enable SASL/SCRAM authentication. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: NoSQL injection in product search service. Attackers could access or modify product catalog data. Medium business impact.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to mongodb-driver-sync@4.11.2. Review and sanitize all query inputs. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: Redis Lua sandbox escape leading to RCE. Session cache and product cache affected. KEV-listed vulnerability with active exploitation.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to redis@7.2.4. Disable Lua scripting if not required. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: SQL injection in PostgreSQL JDBC driver. Orders and user databases affected. PII/PCI data at risk.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to postgresql@42.6.1. Review all database queries for proper parameterization. Deploy within 72 hours.

statements.impact_statement: Authentication bypass in Spring Security. Investigating if our security configuration is affected. All services use Spring Security for auth.
statements.action_statement: Complete investigation by 2024-10-30. If affected, upgrade to spring-boot-starter-security@3.1.6 immediately.

statements.impact_statement: Deserialization RCE in Jackson. All REST APIs use Jackson for JSON processing. High risk of remote code execution.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to jackson-databind@2.15.4. Review deserialization configurations. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: Authentication bypass in Kong API Gateway. All API traffic flows through Kong. Critical infrastructure component.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to kong@3.4.2. Review authentication plugin configurations. Deploy within 24 hours.

statements.impact_statement: Information disclosure in Elasticsearch. Our deployment uses single-tenant configuration without multi-tenancy features. Vulnerability does not apply.
statements.action_statement: Monitor for changes in deployment architecture. Consider upgrading during next maintenance window.

statements.impact_statement: Information disclosure in Stripe SDK. Payment service may leak sensitive payment data in error logs. PCI compliance risk.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to stripe-java@24.3.0. Review error handling and logging. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: SSRF in Next.js image optimization. We use external CDN for image optimization, not Next.js built-in feature. Vulnerability does not apply.
Local privilege escalation in Ubuntu kernel. Container images are immutable and do not allow local user access. Kubernetes pod security policies prevent privilege escalation.
statements.action_statement: Update base images during next rebuild cycle. Low priority.
